title: 2014 - The Year In Christian Music (Bundle 24)
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2014 - THE YEAR IN CHRISTIAN MUSIC
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Surprisingly I'm still not caught up on gathering together all of albums I missed during my hiatus.  But I'm chipping away at it daily.  In the mean while, jpine1980 was looking for Reconcile and V Rose.  Glory2J was looking for that new 2014 Various Hip Hop album.  Bubby_B also wanted a copy of the new V Rose.  And Joe_T mentioned Audrey Assad.  Numberman787 wanted Fight The Fade.  All of those albums can be found in today's bundle.

POP: 1 Girl Nation, His Kidz United, V Rose.  HIP-HOP/RAP: 3MG, Allei, Armond, Klaye, MP, Nick Bravo, Reconcile, Various Hip Hop, Young Joshua.  HARDCORE/METAL: A Feast For Kings, Guardian, Monolith.  GOSPEL: Alex Holt And Free Worship.  CONTEMPORARY: Alice Connaghan, Michael W Smith, Mike Lee.  ALTERNATIVE: Audrey Assad, Mark Peter Schmitt, Various African.  PRAISE & WORSHIP: BCBC Worship, Gary A Edwards II, Gate City Worship, Twila Paris, Visible Worship.  PUNK: Berean Records.  SPOKEN WORD: Brad Stenman.  FOLK: David Verly, Hans Kraenzlin, Joe Cook, The Point Worship.  ROCK: Fight The Fade, Redeemer Music, Willet.  SINGER-SONGWRITER: Hannah Stenman, Mountain Whales,  Ocean's 42, The Seasons.  R&B: Sherida Obimdi.

We have these 42 titles to choose from today...

 * 1 Girl Nation - 2014 - 1 Girl Nation - Deluxe Karaoke Edition
 * 3MG - 2014 - Hedges And Highways - Single
 * A Feast For Kings - 2014 - Hell On Earth EP
 * Alex Holt And Free Worship - 2014 - Nobody - Single

 * Klaye - 2014 - Pulse Of A Nation

God Bless,
TorrentTracts, May 2014
